snippet: Donald Sterling, the embattled owner of the Los Angeles Clippers, broke his silence Sunday and asked for forgiveness.
abstract: Los Angeles Clippers embattled owner Donald Sterling breaks his silence in interview with CNN anchor Anderson Cooper in which he apologizes for racist remarks and asks for forgiveness.
lead_paragraph: Donald Sterling, the embattled owner of the Los Angeles Clippers, broke his silence Sunday and asked for forgiveness.

headline.main: Sterling Offers Apology in Interview With CNN
